import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; function Login() { const [Email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [Password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [isAuth, setIsAuth] = useState(false); const submitForm = () => { axios .post( "http://localhost:3005/user", { email: Email, password: Password, }, { withCredentials: true } ) .then((res) => { if (res.data.isAuth === 1) { setIsAuth(true); } }) .catch((e) => console.log(e)); }; return ( <>
